mapper.update: update apply set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mission_id = #{missionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, take_time = #{takeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, take_state = #{takeState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where apply_id = #{applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select apply_id, user_id, mission_id, take_time, take_state, note from apply
